comment.author: 30937372@N00
comment._content: This is a photograph of the annual Kuomboka ceremony in Barotseland (now Western Province) which take place in March or April, when the Zambezi floods and the Litunga (the Paramount Chief) moves from Lealui on the floodplains to Limulunga on higher ground. The barge in the picture is called the Nalikwanda.
